file_content.text: Thanks for the assist. Private Vendelik, Eighth Imperial Infantry. Might keep your distance--insides leaking out.
You didn't come alone. Where's the rest of your squad?
Tell me where your allies are.
Scattered around. Hutt forces were thorough--droids, especially.
Don't try to move. We'll transport you out of here.
We'll get you medical help.
Generous, but a waste of effort.
Face on the floor, Imperial. You so much as twitch, I'll send you to the Void right now.
I prefer you this way.
That ship's already flown.
Not much time, so listen. Wasn't always Imperial military--born on Makeb.
Caught wind of the Hutt takeover and volunteered for this. Defend my old home.
You don't sound like a typical Imperial. Didn't realize the military was recruiting outside their space.
That explains the accent.
Was this or mining. Bad choice, looking back.
Either the Empire's getting sentimental, or it doesn't know your true loyalties.
And the Empire allowed it?
Good for the mission. Knew the terrain and the people.
I don't want your life story. Tell me what you're doing here before you're too dead to explain.
None of this interests me.
Orders were to steal isotope-5, but I wanted to help your evacuation. Still have friends and family here.
Shutting down drills--not enough. Need to open emergency release valves at primary control center. Reduce core pressure.
Where is this primary control center? We'll go right away.
That makes sense.
Have the coordinates. Controls are locked down. You'll need help.
You're a soldier, not a geologist. How did you figure all this out on your own?
How do you know this?
Grew up on these platforms. My father was a foreman.
You expect me to believe an Imperial sacrificed his life to do something good? Admit it--you've got something else going on.
Why should I believe you?
Don't owe the Empire anything now--just Makeb.
Use slicer spike in control center's mainframe. Override Hutt security lockout. Take control, vent the core.
Control center's heavily guarded. Sorry, that part's on you. Please get my people off this rock.
On my honor as a Jedi, your loved ones will be saved.
You have my word.
I believe you.
Death is not the end. We are all simply echoes of the Living Force.
Be at peace.
Nice thought.
You did your duty, soldier. I'll do mine.
Consider it done.
Signed up with the wrong side. Oh, well.
When I take a job, I always see it through--even when it's for an Imperial. I'll save your people.
That's the plan.
Not Imperial anymore. Just a man.
Is there a message you want delivered to your friends and family?
Any last words for loved ones?
No time.
I'll take out that control center, but I'm not doing anything else until I've confirmed your story with my people.
I still don't trust you.
Wish I could stay....
They'll back me up.
